replies.author: kilpikonna
replies.txt_content:
请确定您写对了权限节点
权限: 
 - essentials.gamemode
 - essentials.gamemode.creative
PEX权限组指令: 
 - /pex user <用户名> add essentials.gamemode
 - /pex user <用户名> add essentials.gamemode.creative
